sentences: Akụkọ
Egwuregwu
Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu
Akụkọ
Egwuregwu
Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu
Ebe foto si, jidesanwoolu/hildabaci/Instagram

Gọvanọ Legọs steeti bụ Babajide Sanwo-Olu agaala na mpaghara Lekki ịga gosi nkwado ya maka nwaada Hilda Effiong Bassey, onye a ma dịka Hilda Baci, bụ onye nọ asọmpi idebenye aha ya n'akwụkwọ Guiness World Record.
Nwaada Baci chọrọ ịbụ onye kacha sie nri ogologo oge n'ụwa, dịka ọ malitere asọmpi isi nri a kamgbe ụbọchị 11 nke ọnwa Mee.
Gọvanọ Sanwo-Olu na ụfọdụ ndị ọrụ ya so mee njem a n'ehihe Sọnde a, abalị 14 nke  ọnwa Mee, 2023 iji nye hilda nkwado ma jalite mmụọ ya.
Site n’ozi Hilda kesara na soshal midia ya, a hụrụ ebe o dere na Osote onyeisiala Naijirịa bụ Yemi Osibanjo kpọrọ ya n’ekwenti ma gbaa ya ume n’ọrụ ya.
Gọọmentị Akwa Ibom bụ steeti osi zipụtakwa ozi too ya ma ya ume.

Ozi nke kọmịshọna mgbasaozi steeti ahụ bụ Ini Ememobong binyereaka dere: “Anyị na-ele etu Hilda Bassey Effiong si agba mbọ inweta ihe mmeri na Guiness Book of World Records... Ihe a ọ na-anwa agbaala nrị anyị n’anwụ n’ihu ụwa, ọ bụ ihe iji mee ọnụ nye steeti anyị nakwa omenala anyị.”
Gọvanọị Dapo Abiodun nke Ogun steeti ezipụtakwala ozi nye ya bụ nwaada ma kwuo:
“Osiite Hilda, anyị na-eto gị maka etu isi tinye uchu n'igosipụta ugboro ugboro na ịrụsi ọrụ ike, ịgba isi akwara n’ọrụ nakwa ịnwe mmụọ dị ọkụ n’ọrụ gị... ihe ọ bụla ga-ekwe omume.”

Ọtụtụ ndị ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị ndị ọzọ ezipụtakwala ozi na-agba nwaada ume gụnyere Peter Obi onye zọọrọ Labour Party ọkwa onyeisiala, Atiku Abubakar bụbu osote onyeisiala Naịjirịa nakwa onye zọọrọ PDP ọkwa onyeisiala na ntuliaka 2023.
Ọtụtụ ndị a ma ama na Naịjirịa, tinyere ndị otiegwu, ndị ọgbaegwu, ndị ọkpa ọchị, nakwa ndị na-eme ejije egosila Hilda nkwado.
Saint Obi: Odogwu ejije Nollywood, Obinna Nwafor, alaala mmụọ14 Mee 2023
Nri 'GMO' ọ nwereike imetụta ahụike gị?12 Mee 2023
Igbo symbolism: Ịtụ nzu, ịji akwụkwọ ube machie nkwụelu na ihe nrịbama ndị ọzọ dị omimi n'Ala Igbo na ihe  ha pụtara12 Mee 2023
Ebe foto si, myfoodbyhilda/Instagram
Hilda Effiong Bassey, onye a ma dị Hilda Baci, bụ nwaada Naịjirịa aha ya na-ewu ebe niile na soshal midia ugbua, n'ihi asọmpi isi nri nke ọ malitere kamgbe abalị atọ gara aga.
Nwa ada a dị afọ 27 chọrọ idebanye aha ya nakwa aha Naịjirịa n'akwụkwọ 'Guiness Book of Records' dịka onye kacha sie nri ogologo oge n'ụwa niile.
Ọ chọrọ iji nke a kụchapụ Lata Tondon nke mba India bụ onye ji nturuugo maka ogologo oge mmadụ siri nri, dịka o siri nri akwụsịghị akwụsị ruo awa 87 na nkeji 45 n'obodo Rewa nke mba India n'afọ 2019.
Hilda malitere asọmpi ya n'ụbọchị Tọzde bụ ụbọchị 11 nke ọnwa Mee, ebe ya bụ asọmpi ga-akụrụ ọnụ taa bụ Sọnde, ụbọchị 14 nke ọnwa Mee.
"Njem a iji tinye aha m n'akwụkwọ Guinness Book of Records' malitere afọ ise gara aga," Hilda kwuru na mkparịtaụka ya na ndị ntaakụkọ.
"Ọ bụ otu n'ime ihe ndị m kachc chọọ imejupụta na ndụ m. Akwadoola m maka ya nke ọma n'ụzọ dị icheiche."
"Asọmpi a bụ ọhere iji kọọ akụkọ ọma dị icheiche gbasara Afrịka site n'ụdị nri dị icheiche anyị nwere.
"Ọ bụkwa iji gosipụta ike nke ndị ntorobịa Naịjirịa nwere iji gosipụta ihe ha nwereike imenwu ma ọ bụrụ na e nye ha nkwado kwesịrị ekwesị."
Ebe foto si, myfoodbyhilda/Instagram
Ka ọ dị ugbua, ọ gafeela awa 64 kamgbe Hilda Baci malitere asọmpi isi nri a, mana ọ fọdụụrụ ya awa 32 iji ruo oge ọ na-ele anya iji tinye aha ya n'akwụkwọ akụkọ mba ụwa.
Kamgbe ọ malitere asọmpi a n'ụbọchị Tọzde, o siela nri karịrị 110 ma nyekwa ndị mmadụ karịrị 2,795 nri.
Ọtụtụ ndị ntorobịa Naịjirịa jupụtara n'Amore Gardens dị na Lekki, Legọs, bụ ebe asọmpi isi nri a na-aga n'ihu, iji nye Hilda nkwado.
Na soshal midia, ọtụtụ na-etinyekwa ozi nkwado dị icheiche iji jaa ya ike, dịka 'rooting for Hilda' bụ ihe kacha ewu ewu n'ọbaozi Twitter Naịjirịa n'ụtụtụ Sọnde a.
'Hilda Baci' sokwa n'otu ihe ndị mmadụ kacha chọọ n'ọbaozi Google n'ụbọchị Satọde, Mee 13.
